item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, September 30, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. California bans legacy admissions at private universities (49 points | 39 comments)
2. Bop Spotter (983 points | 197 comments)
3. Launch HN: Inkeep (YC W23) – Copilot for Support (think Cursor for help desks) (45 points | 39 comments)
4. Paramotorists soar across remote Peru desert to collect threatened plants (25 points | 12 comments)
5. Engineers investigate another malfunction on SpaceX's Falcon 9 rocket (18 points | discuss)
6. Apple No Longer in Talks to Invest in ChatGPT Maker OpenAI (33 points | 1 comment)
7. Phrase matching in Marginalia Search (98 points | 16 comments)
8. Gavin Newsom vetoes SB 1047 (702 points | 410 comments)
9. Show HN: A macOS app to prevent sound quality degradation on AirPods (52 points | 70 comments)
10. EasyPost (YC S13) Is Hiring ( | hide)
11. The Physics of Colliding Balls (47 points | 12 comments)
12. Normans and Slavery: Breaking the Bonds (89 points | 47 comments)
13. Keep Track: 3D Satellite Toolkit (110 points | 28 comments)
14. Product Hunt isn't dying, it's becoming gentrified (15 points | 11 comments)
15. Two new books on John Calhoun and his rodent experiments (63 points | 40 comments)
16. The fight to save Chile's white strawberry (37 points | 10 comments)
17. Screenpipe: 24/7 local AI screen and mic recording (136 points | 84 comments)
18. Generate pip requirements.txt file based on imports of any project (89 points | 50 comments)
19. How we built ngrok's data platform (113 points | 30 comments)
20. The best browser bookmarking system is files (58 points | 66 comments)
21. Peer Calls: WebRTC peer to peer calls for everyone (28 points | 11 comments)
22. Tips for Building and Deploying Robots (79 points | 15 comments)
23. Map with public fruit trees (306 points | 129 comments)
24. NotebookLM's automatically generated podcasts are surprisingly effective (761 points | 389 comments)
25. New research on anesthesia and microtubules gives new clues about consciousness (117 points | 129 comments)
26. GnuCash 5.9 Released (9 points | 1 comment)
27. Liquid Foundation Models: Our First Series of Generative AI Models (155 points | 124 comments)
28. No such thing as exactly-once delivery (8 points | discuss)
29. Sitina1 Open-Source Camera (298 points | 116 comments)
30. Do AI companies work? (163 points | 156 comments)
